newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Egana acquires Cardin watches trademarks.
newsitem.headline: Egana acquires Cardin watches trademarks.

text.p: Egana International (Holdings) Ltd said on Wednesday Monsieur Pierre Cardin had agreed to assign and transfer the ownership of the Pierre Cardin Trademarks for time pieces and parts to the company.
Monsieur Pierre Cardin is the beneficial owner of Pierre Cardin trademark and its logo worldwide, the company said.

Egana said Monsieur Pierre Cardin had agreed to assign and transfer the trademark ownership on a worldwide basis, except in Argentina, Uruguay, Chile and Japan, to the company's wholly-owned P.C. International Marketing Ltd.
It gave no details on investment involved.
